posts.post_content:
Lot of 25 T212 Obaks Sold.

12 are the Blue Back series of 175. Lot in lncludes Brashear, Danzig, Gardner, Killilay, Krapp, Lynch, Nordyke, Moser, Perry, Perrine, Raymer & Zackert.

If graded all are in the 1 to 3 catagory, with no complete beaters and no real back issues.

13 are from the Red Back series. Lot includes Berry, Daley, Higgins, Householder, Morse, Netzel, Ostdiek, Raleigh, Sheehan (Vernon), Thomas, Wares, Wheeler & Wiggs. 

The red back Obaks are not overall as high grade as the blue backs, but still decent. Sheehan & Thomas has writing on the back & Higgins has a small amount of a stamp, but the others don't have an real back damage.

Sold. Paypal ok.

Below are representative scans of the lot. I can email scans of the front & back of all 25 cards if desired. I didn't want to clutter up the posting with too many scans.
